Name: Dungeon: Faster & Deadlier
About the game: Under your leadership, the heroes are trying to save the kingdom from the lord of the dark world. They fight their enemies using your judgement, your experience, and your ability to use chance to their advantage. Combine magic, artifacts and brute force. Tacticize and seek the right path to victory! FEATURES Dynamic Deckbuilding: Reassemble your deck during your run to prepare for specific situations and enemies. Gradually Revealed Map: Go through the tiles one by one or teleport between portals, using the knowledge you've gained about the position of enemies or other secret locations. Multiple Card-Playing Options: Play cards as they are meant to be played. Or sacrifice them to gain the resources needed to play other cards. Or play them using Cultic Items to change their effect. Five Great Heroes: A variety of heroes from all over the world who will use their strengths and weaknesses to fight evil. Upgrade Heroes and Cards: Begin each new run more powerful and take revenge on the enemy responsible for your previous failure. Discover Cultic Items and Artifacts: Find and use a variety of items to help you in your endeavor. Learn how to use them.
